name: FameHog
overview:
FameHog is an entertainment hub and industry marketplace. A virtual network where members of the film and television can showcase their work, connect with other professionals and access classifieds.

FameHog provides the tools to create a state of art â€œWebletâ€ where members can post their resumes, photos, videos, audio tracks, news, press and contact information. A â€œWebletâ€ is a mini website complete with media, pictures, and info put together in one package at the entertainment industryâ€™s fingertips.

FameHog is home to actors, directors, make-up artists, producers, production companies, photographers, editors, stunt men, visual effects, casting directors, agents, managers, and many more. From the most seasoned veteran to the next big thing, FameHog provides a place for everybody who is or wants to be apart of the film or television industry to shine.

FameHog offers a exceptional set of features and services to both our members and our guests; creating a symbiotic community between those wanting to showcase their work and gain exposure and those looking to find specific talent. The industry is changing, welcome to the Evolution
